At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, and if unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before unit's first attack during combat. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30% and unit's next attack deals damage = total damage reduced (by any source, including other skills; resets at end of combat), and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.
